content:
Can you provide a corrected version of the following sentence using proper English grammar? 
"We going to the beach" 
Additionally, could you please provide your correction in an Excel table format with the following columns: 
| Incorrect Sentence | Corrected Sentence |
|-------------------|--------------------|

Certainly! Here's the corrected version of the sentence in the requested Excel table format:

| Incorrect Sentence  | Corrected Sentence  |
|---------------------|---------------------|
| We going to the beach | We are going to the beach |
